raw_body:
SAMARAWICKRAMA LAKSHMI IRANGANIE (nee RANASINGHE) – Beloved daughter of Orleans and Anna Ranasinghe,​ wife of late Piyadasa (Sam) Samarawickrama (J L Morrison & Sons),​ beloved mother of Inoka Weerasinghe,​ Pararajasingham and precious grandmother of Maya Weerasinghe,​ mother-in-law of Suresh Pararajasingham and Inaka Weerasinghe,​ sister of Sujatha,​ Manel,​ Sarojini and late Indranee,​ Chandra,​ Asoka (Tissa) and Shanthi,​ passed away peacefully at home – ‘Orleans’,​ No. 29/​3,​ Jambugasmulla Mawatha,​ Nugegoda on 30th January 2024. Remains will lie at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s Kanatta Road,​ Colombo 07. Cortege leaves at 3.30 p.m. on 1st February 2024 for Cremation at Borella General Cemetery.
007217
